Rulings.Edison:
●The “Gladiator Beast” monster returned to the Deck is returned to the Deck when “Parry” is resolved. It is not a cost. You must show the “Gladiator Beast” to your opponent when resolving “Parry’s” effect.
●You can't activate “Parry” if you don't have a “Gladiator Beast” monster in your hand.

Rulings.Base: 1. The 'Gladiator Beast' monster returned to the Deck is returned to the Deck when "Parry" is resolved. It is not a cost. You must show the 'Gladiator Beast' to your opponent when resolving the effect of "Parry".\n2. You cannot activate "Parry" if you do not have a 'Gladiator Beast' monster in your hand.
